title: 求一份skillapi的papi变量扩展和skillapi的全部papi变量
author: 喜塔腊尔晴
txt_content:
求大佬帮助!!!
求一份Skillapi的Papi变量扩展文件和
全部skillapi的papi变量(仅有当前和此等级最大经验值,最大蓝量和当前蓝量,最大血量和当前血量,当前等级,当前所有技能点也行)
+Papi的wiki网址
开服急用！！！

replies.author: chw霖酱喵~
replies.txt_content:
https://mineplugin.org/PlaceholderAPI

√SkillAPI插件列表%skillapi_attribute_points% 点数%skillapi_mana% 神力%skillapi_max_mana% 最大神力%skillapi_skill_level_<skillName>% 技能的等级%skillapi_skill_points_<skillName>% 点数%skillapi_skill_cost_<skillName>% 花费%skillapi_skill_levelreq_<skillName>% 需要等级%skillapi_skill_is_maxed_<skillName>% 是否满级%skillapi_skill_message_<skillName>% 消息%skillapi_skill_type_<skillName>% 类型%skillapi_skill_req_<skillName>% 需求
这些下面的和上面的意思相同，#号你可以替换成 1-<玩家拥有的技能数> 将展示玩家 第一个 第二个······技能
%skillapi_player_skill_points_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_level_<#>% %skillapi_player_skill_levelreq_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_name_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_message_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_req_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_type_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_can_autolevel_<#>%%skillapi_player_skill_can_cast_<#>%
